entries.title: Help URL
entries.description: URL to the manual. If empty, it links to the latest manual from BEXIS2

entries.title: Number of cells for direct upload instead of async
entries.description: This number of cells determines whether an upload of structured data should be executed directly or async.

entries.title: File upload description
entries.description: If it is activated, adding a description per file is possible.

entries.title: Multiple file upload
entries.description: Allow multiple files to be uploaded at the same time.

entries.title: Attachment description
entries.description: If it is activated, adding a description per file is possible.

entries.title: Multiple attachment upload
entries.description: Allow multiple files to be uploaded at the same time.
